DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether 4 Pillars Toolkit increase adult Influenza , pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ( PPSV ) , tetanus , adult diphtheria acellular pertussis vaccine ( Tdap/Td ) vaccination rate . The vaccine FDA license vaccine use accord national guideline . The investigator conduct randomize cluster trial toolkit diverse primary care practice electronic medical record ( EMRs ) .
DOC.brief_title: SOP Toolkit Diverse Practices Implemented & Tested With RE-AIM
DOC.detailed_description: This intervention two-region , two-year , stratified randomize cluster trial 24 primary care practice EMRs . These practice randomly assign intervention control sit test 4 Pillars Toolkit intervention package evidence-based technique tailor practice structure culture ; one set practice randomize intervention year 1 control . In year 2 , set practice receive intervention community control may seek . These diverse practice consist : 18 diverse practice UPMC western Pennsylvania 6 diverse practice large community health center PBRN Texas .
DOC.criteria: Practice staff adult enrol clinical site Site inclusion criterion : 1 ) appropriate adult population : e.g. , adult age 50 year old ; 2 ) currently use EMR prompt ability , EpicCare ; 3 ) keep immunization data within EMR Patientlevel inclusion criterion : 1 ) Adults ( 18 year ) active patient enrol practice ( e.g. , active patient visit within last 12 month ) 2 ) All unvaccinated adult without contraindication eligible receive Td/Tdap influenza , regardless age age 65 year older eligible PPSV . Site exclusion criterion : 1 ) consistent SOP use 3 vaccine study high vaccination rate ( e.g. , 80 % ) Patientlevel exclusion criterion : 1 ) true contraindication , follow CDC 's Guide Contraindications ( attach US Recommended Adult Immunization Schedule ) , prior vaccine anaphylaxis .
